title: Photovoltaic regulators
fullText:
Regulators for photovoltaic arrays should be capable of carrying 125% of the array short- circuit current. Regulators shall withstand the open circuit voltage of the array at the lowest expected operating temperature.
Large arrays may need to be split into sub-arrays. Considerations areâ€”
(a)	the availability of high current regulators;
(b)	improved fault tolerance; and
(c)	more staged battery charging.
